name: Bestiarium Invocation Toy
description:
Click on a candle and drag to another one to create a line. Different figures invoke different creatures. Change the number on the top left side to define the amount of candles. If you toggle the T-Pose, you can see way better how different the creatures are.

This small prototype is basically to test some procedural creature generation techniques - which makes me wish this was a space game just so I could call it "Poor Man's Sky".

Will probably do a writeup about it in the next few weeks.
